overview: This film chronicles three characters working in health care sales in Guangzhou: the boss, the manager and the ordinary salesman. It presents the life of a salesman in the hustle and bustle of the early twentieth century from the perspective of different identity classes. Busy, scurrying and disorganised, the current situation of running for survival is interspersed with the loss of faith and mistaken identity unique to contemporary China.
title: Boiling Dust
